summary: David Sloan travels to Rio for a kick-box exhibition. There he saves two youngsters and stops a white slaver.
cast: Sasha Mitchell|Dennis Chan|Richard Comar|Noah Verduzco|Alethea Miranda|Milton Gonçalves|Ricardo Petráglia|Gracindo Júnior|Miguel Oniga|Lolô Souza Pinto|Renato Coutinho|Kate Lyra|Ian Jacklin|Manitou Felipe|Shuki Ron|Bernardo Jablonski|Fábio Junqueira|Nildo Parente|Cibele Sta Cruz|Marco Ruas|Angelo DeMatos|Ivan DeAquino|Mike Royster|Ivan Setta|Ruy Brito Jr.|Sergio Jesus|Renata Roriz|Reno Moroni|Charles Myara|Frank Santos|Ana Paula Bouzas|Monique Lafond
title: Kickboxer III: El arte de la guerra
